channel.title: I cannot cook on the cooking range i added?!?
channel.description:
I added all different cooking ranges to my server, but i couldnt cook on any of them... but i can cook on in game cookign ranges, just none of them i put in..
how do i make it so i can cook on the ones i put in??
THANKYOU

item.title: I cannot cook on the cooking range i added?!?
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

Looks correct to me did you compile it? :S

Read full topic
item.source: I cannot cook on the cooking range i added?!?

item.title: I cannot cook on the cooking range i added?!?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

public void cookFish() { if(!playerHasItem(317) && !playerHasItem(377) && !playerHasItem(383) && !playerHasItem(7944) && !playerHasItem(389)){ // if player does not have these fish IDs, then return. You can add to the list if your adding more fish into cooking return; } if (playerHasItem(317)) { // this one is for shrimps deleteItem(317, 1); // delete 1 raw shrimp addItem(315, 1); // add 1 cooked shrimp lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(120, playerCooking); // add 120 exp to cooking sM("You cook the shrimps."); setAnimation(883); } if (playerHasItem(377) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 39) { // this one is for lobsters deleteItem(377, 1); // delete 1 raw lobster addItem(379, 1); // add 1 cooked lobster lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(300, playerCooking); // add 300 exp to cooking sM("You cook the lobster."); setAnimation(883); } if (playerHasItem(383) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 60) { // this one is for sharks deleteItem(383, 1); // delete 1 raw shark addItem(385, 1); // add 1 cooked shark lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(1000, playerCooking); // add 1000 exp to cooking sM("You cook the shark."); setAnimation(883); } if (playerHasItem(383) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 65) { // this one is for monkfish deleteItem(7944, 1); // delete 1 raw monkfish addItem(7946, 1); // add 1 cooked monkfish lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(1200, playerCooking); // add 1200 exp to cooking sM("You cook the monkfish ."); setAnimation(883); } if (playerHasItem(389) && playerLevel[playerCooking] > 70) { // this one is for manta rays deleteItem(389, 1); // delete 1 raw manta ray addItem(391, 1); // add 1 cooked manta ray lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addSkillXP(1750, playerCooking); // add 1750 exp to cooking sM("You cook the manta ray."); setAnimation(883); } }

I pretty much gave you the entire void. If not, I gave you cooking
look carefully to the messages beside the "//"s
